Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Specimen Container(s): Xpert® Nasopharyngeal Sample Collection Kit (Plastic medical-grade polypropylene tube with individually-wrapped sterile swab)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated multiplex real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert® Xpress Flu assay using automated multiplex RT-PCR for qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA from nasopharyngeal swab specimens in patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, intended as an aid in diagnosis of influenza in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
